abilities.reminder: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a [type].

abilities.name: Shadow
abilities.reminder: This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.

abilities.name: Menace
abilities.reminder: This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

abilities.name: Skulk
abilities.reminder: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.

abilities.name: Blurry
abilities.reminder: This creature can be blocked only if defending player was wearing glasses as it was cast.

abilities.name: Denimwalk
abilities.reminder: If defending player is wearing any clothing made of denim, this creature is unblockable.

abilities.name: Art menace
abilities.reminder: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with two or more visible figures in their art.

abilities.name: Epic
abilities.reminder: For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

abilities.name: Awaken
abilities.reminder: If you cast this card for [cost], also put N +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

abilities.name: Cipher
abilities.reminder: Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of this card without paying its mana cost.

abilities.name: Ascend
abilities.reminder: If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city’s blessing for the rest of the game.

abilities.name: Annihilator
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks, defending player [[sacrifice]]s N [[permanent]]s.

abilities.name: Champion
abilities.reminder: When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another creature you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.

abilities.name: Battle cry
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

abilities.name: Bushido
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +N/+N until end of turn.

abilities.name: Conspire
abilities.reminder: As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.

abilities.name: Cascade
abilities.reminder: When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card whose mana value is less than this spell's mana value. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost if the resulting spell's mana value is less than this spell's mana value. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast on the bottom of your library in a random order.

abilities.name: Dethrone
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

abilities.name: Echo
abilities.reminder: At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.

abilities.name: Evoke
abilities.reminder: You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.

abilities.name: Evolve
abilities.reminder: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

abilities.name: Exalted
abilities.reminder: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each instance of exalted among permanents you control.

abilities.name: Extort
abilities.reminder: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay  If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.

abilities.name: Flanking
abilities.reminder: Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

abilities.name: Graft
abilities.reminder: This creature enters the battlefield with N +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.

abilities.name: Gravestorm
abilities.reminder: When you cast this spell, copy it for each permanent put into a graveyard this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.reminder: When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.

abilities.name: Hideaway
abilities.reminder: When this permanent enters the battlefield, look at the top N cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.

abilities.name: Living weapon
abilities.reminder: When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this Equipment to it.

abilities.name: Miracle
abilities.reminder: You may cast this card for its Miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.

abilities.name: Madness
abilities.reminder: If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.

abilities.name: Modular
abilities.reminder: This enters the battlefield with N +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.

abilities.name: Persist
abilities.reminder: When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a -1/-1 counter on it.

abilities.name: Poisonous
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets N poison counters.

abilities.name: Provoke
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +N/+N until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.

abilities.name: Recover
abilities.reminder: When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay [cost]. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.

abilities.name: Replicate
abilities.reminder: When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.

abilities.name: Ripple
abilities.reminder: When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top N cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.

abilities.name: Soulbond
abilities.reminder: You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.

abilities.name: Soulshift
abilities.reminder: When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with mana value N or less from your graveyard to your hand.

abilities.name: Storm
abilities.reminder: When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.

abilities.name: Suspend
abilities.reminder: Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay [cost] and exile it with N time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.last_seen: Lord of the Rings Holiday Release
abilities.reminder: When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

abilities.name: Prowess
abilities.last_seen: March of the Machine: The Aftermath
abilities.reminder: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

abilities.name: Renown
abilities.last_seen: Lord of the Rings Holiday Release
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put N +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.

abilities.name: Exploit
abilities.reminder: When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.

abilities.name: Ingest
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library

abilities.name: Myriad
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. If one or more tokens are created this way, exile the tokens at end of combat.

abilities.name: Vanishing
abilities.reminder: This permanent enters the battlefield with N time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.

abilities.name: Fading
abilities.reminder: This creature enters the battlefield with N fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.

abilities.name: Melee
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.

abilities.name: Fabricate
abilities.reminder: When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may put N +1/+1 counters on it. If you don't, create N 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.

abilities.name: Glorify
abilities.reminder: When this creature dies while attacking, target attacking creature gains {creature keyword} permanently.

abilities.name: Afflict
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses N life.

abilities.name: Cumulative upkeep
abilities.reminder: At the beginning of your upkeep, if this permanent is on the battlefield, put an age counter on this permanent. Then you may pay [cost] for each age counter on it. If you don’t, sacrifice it.

abilities.name: partner
abilities.reminder: You can have two commanders if both have partner.

abilities.name: "partner with"
abilities.reminder: You can have two commanders if both have partner.

abilities.name: Mentor
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.

abilities.name: Afterlife
abilities.reminder: When this creature dies, create N 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token(s) with flying.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +N/+0 until end of turn.

abilities.name: Demonstrate
abilities.reminder: When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.

abilities.name: Ward
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays [cost].

abilities.name: Training
abilities.reminder: Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

abilities.name: Casualty
abilities.reminder: As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power N or greater. When you do, copy this spell.

abilities.name: Squad
abilities.reminder: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay [cost] any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.

abilities.name: Double team
abilities.reminder: When this creature attacks, if it's not a token, conjure a duplicate of it into your hand. Then both cards perpetually lose double team.

abilities.name: Ravenous
abilities.reminder: This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.

abilities.name: For Mirrodin!
abilities.reminder: When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.

abilities.name: To solve
abilities.reminder: At the beginning of your end step, if [condition] and this Case is not solved, it becomes solved.

abilities.name: Best in show
abilities.reminder: Whenever another creature becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may copy that spell or ability. If you do, the copy targets this creature.
